qg7jm2Sr.title: Investigation on General Situation of International Rice Research Institute(IRRI)
qg7jm2Sr.abstract: In order to understand the latest research development trend and deeply know the general situation of International Rice Research Institute(IRRI),a one-week investigation was made.IRRI is a simplified organ with clarified mission not only for research,but also for training.The research projects mainly involve combining between rice and biological health,enhancing genetic diversity and discovering new genes,stabilizing the development of society and carrying out project training,and strengthening information management,establishing and updating data bank.The recent research development trend includes functional genome research in rice,wide crossing breeding,good quality rice research,drought-resistance mechanism and marker-assisted selection breeding,genetic transformation,hybrid rice breeding,new plant type and superior rice breeding.The clear research target,highly efficient work and cooperative spirits in IRRI will enlighten us on our research.

gwodyfgO.title: Effect of Cultivation Measures on Yield and Quality of Shendao 9
gwodyfgO.abstract: Using Shendao 9 as a material,the effects of N,P,K application,seeding rate and planting density on rice growth and development were studied by standardization design to determinate cultivation measures in condition of highyield rice for increasing yield and improving rice quality.The results showed that coefficients of variation(CV) affected by treatment factors on chalkiness and percentage of chalky kernel were larger in traits,while the CVs of gel consistency and eating value were smaller.The multiple regression analysis result showed that N application was the key factor influencing rice yield.Panicles per hill increased and 1 000-grain weight decreased with the increase of N application.N application availed to increase brown rice,head rice,percentage of chalky kernel and protein content,but decrease quality value.K application availed to raise quality value and brown rice,but decrease protein content.Widening transplanting hole distance could increase panicles per hill and ripened grains per panicle,which might avail to improve milling quality and decrease percentage of chalky kernel and chalkiness.The effect of treatments on gel consistency and amylose content was not significant.

wifEfBYm.title: Analysis of Rice Production in Northern China
wifEfBYm.abstract: The north rice production status was studied using dynamic analysis method. The result indicated that the planting area, grain yield per unit area and output of rice in northern China were all increasing from 1961 to 2005, but the quality of rice was lower than that of consumers' demand. The eating quality needs improving. In high-yielding and fine quality rice production, multiple techniques composed of high-yielding rice varieties selection, sparse sowing and transplanting, nutrient equilibrium fertilizing, water-saving irrigation, comprehensive plant diseases, insect pests and paddy weeds control should be applied.

2xnNQUYW.title: CHARACTERIZATION OF RICE HIGH-TILLERING AND DWARF 1(HTD1) GENE PROMOTER IN TRANSGENIC Arabidopsis
2xnNQUYW.abstract: The expression pattern of the promoter of rice HIGH-TILLERING DWARF1(HTD1) gene in transgenic Arabidopsis was studied based on the analysis of β-glucuronidase(GUS) reporter gene.The HTD1∶∶GUS construct was introduced into wild Arabidopsis by Agrobacterium-mediated transformation.The expression pattern of the promoter was analyzed by GUS staining.GUS histochemical assay showed that GUS expression under HTD1 promoter occurred mainly in the vascular tissues of leaves,petioles,hypocotyls and basal main roots in the seedling stages of transgenic Arabidopsis.

Ho5BtpZH.title: Effect of Amount of N-applied on Grain Yield and Quality of Rice
Ho5BtpZH.abstract: Use the rice varieties of Liaojing 294(erect-panicle type) and Shennong 8718(curved-panicle type) as experimental materials,the effect of N on grain yield and quality of rice was studied under the field condition.The results were as follows: The appropriate amounts of N of Liaojing 294 and Shennong 8718 were 190kg·hm~(-2) and 167kg·hm~(-2),respectively.The responses of yield,quality traits of two rice varieties to fertilizer-N were similar.With increasing of the amount of N-applied,the numbers of panicle increased significantly,but all of spikelets per panicle,ripened grains per panicle,percentage of ripened grains and 1000-grain weight reduce obviously.Among the rice quality traits,chalky grain and chalkiness area were the most sensitive to N-fertilizer,the protein content,fatty acid content and head rice rate were susceptible,and the others were little correspondingly.With increasing of the amount of N-applied,chalky grain,chalkiness area and protein content increased significantly,brown rice rate,milled rice rate,amylose content and fatty acid content decreased,head rice rate and gel consistency responsed in conic,respectively.

wjhYNQ4I.title: Quality Traits of Main Japonica Rice Cultivars in Northeastern China
wjhYNQ4I.abstract: Using the main Japonica rice cultivars in northeastern China as entries,the milling quality,appearance quality,cooking and eating quality and nutritional quality were analyzed and 55 cultivars tested were further clustered and evaluated based on the quality traits.The results showed that the lower head rice rate and the higher chalky grain rate were the major factors restricting the quality of rice in the northeastern area.Longdao 3 had the highest up-to-standard rate of high quality rice traits,of which six important quality traits reached the class one level.Among each quality trait of rice,the milling quality of Changbai 9 was the best.The chalky grain rate and degree of chalkiness of Shasha'ni was the lowest.The protein content of Longdao 3 was the lowest and its eating quality score tested with AN-700 was the highest.The eating quality of Shendao 1 through artificial taste was the best.The head rice rate was negatively correlated with chalky grain rate,gel consistency,protein content and significant positively correlated with the results tested with AN-700.Chalky grain rate had a significantly positive correlation with amylose content,protein content,but had a significant negative correlation with the results tested with AN-700.Results of hierarchical clustering showed that the palatability quality of rice in Liaoning was good,while the head rice rate was low and chalky grain rate was high.

fMzbiMqD.title: Genetic analysis and mapping of high-tillering and dwarf mutant htd1-2 in rice]
fMzbiMqD.abstract: Tillering is one of the most important agronomic traits of rice. In order to explore the molecular mechanism of rice tillering, a high-tillering dwarf 1-2 (htd1-2) mutant was isolated from the offspring of the indica rice (Oryza sativa L. ssp. indica) variety 9311 treated with 350Gy 60Co gamma-radiation. Genetic analysis showed that both high tillering and dwarf phenotypes of htd1-2 were controlled by a single recessive nuclear gene. By means of molecular marker technique, the HIGH-TILLERING DWARF1-2(HTD1-2) gene was mapped between two CAPS markers A6 and E2 on chromosome 4 within 116 kilobases. Within this region, there is a cloned gene HIGH-TILLERING DWARF1(HTD1), which controls rice tillering. By comparing sequences of HTD1 between htd1-2 and 9311, in combination with the results from dCAPS analysis, we believed that HTD1 is an orthologue of the gene HTD1-2. Because of different genetic backgrounds, htd1 and htd1-2 have different phenotypes although they are the allelic mutants. Furthermore, removal of axillary buds proved that dwarfism of htd1-2 mutant is partly attributed to its excessive tillers.

eaDMreCA.title: Comparison of Relationships between Yield and Eating Quality in Different Types of Rice Varieties
eaDMreCA.abstract: The difference and relationships between yield and quality of different types of rice varieties were studied with 12 main cultivated varieties in Liaoning Province to provide the foundation for high yield and quality breeding.The results showed that the yield of the rice varieties with dense panicle was higher than those with semi-dense panicle,followed by those with loose panicle.The number of ripened grains and spikelets of dense-panicle varities were higher than those with thin panicle.The eating quality of dense-panicle varieties was better than those with thin panicle.The protein content of dense-panicle varieties was lower than those with thin panicle.Yield and eating quality could reach a higher level with 8.5-9.2 grains per cm,3.2-3.3 million panicle per ha,150-170 spikelets and 140-160 ripened grains per panicle.The yield and quality of the varieties with semi-dense panicle type could be much higher.

sipvXabX.title: Effects of Nitrogen Fertilizer on Japonica Rice Quality
sipvXabX.abstract: The effects of different application rate of nitrogen fertilizer on rice yields,milling quality,appearance and nutritional quality was studied in this research.The results showed that in the high nitrogen treatment,Shennong 315 yielded at a higher rate of 9.78t/hm 2.With the increasing of nitrogen fertilizer,brown rice rate,head rice rate and the whole rice rate showed an upward trend,the quality of rice milling was improved.The application rate of nitrogen fertilizer had a distinct influence on rice chalkiness rate and chalkiness degree.It influenced the quality of the rice appearance.With an increasing of nitrogen amount,rice protein content increased significantly,but fatty acid content and taste value declined,therefore affected the rice nutritional quality.In terms of rice taste,Shennong 315 had a superior level of viscocity,elasticity,appearance and aroma than that of Shendao 7 and Shendao 11,followed by Shendao 11.Shendao 7 acted better in retrogradation properties determination.

lZSXN62k.title: Problems and Countermeasures: Teaching of Crop Cultivation in Agricultural Colleges and Univesities
lZSXN62k.abstract: Science of crop cultivation is an applied subject of much practicality.Teaching of the subject in Shenyang Agricultural University taken for example,problems in the teaching are pointed out,such as the too much condensed contents,outdated and simplistic teaching means,young teachers' shortage of teaching practice,overemphasis on theoretical teaching and ignorance of practice teaching,etc.Countermeasures are put forward that the means for teaching reform should be elaborated;the team structure of teaching staffs optimized;the teaching team building strengthened;the suitable textbooks selected and their teaching contents optimized;the teaching methods improved and the main teaching points stressed;the hardware of practice teaching strengthend and the college students' integrated quality emphasized.In brief,in order to foster modern talents who can meet demands of agricultural modernization,a solid theoretical foundation must be laid for students by improving their knowledge system and steeling them in production and practice.

NqhV1tal.title: Genetic Analysis of Semi-dwarf Plant Using Mixed Major Gene Plus Polygenes Model in Rice
NqhV1tal.abstract: The genetic segregation analysis of plant height was made with the parents of Shendao 4,a semi-dwarf rice variety (P1),Shennong 637,a medium heighf line(P2)and their F1 and F2 population using the mixed major gene plus poly-gene inheritance model.The results showed that plant height was controlled by two major genes with additive-dominant-epistatic effects and polygenes with additive-dominant-epistatic effects.The additive effects of the two major genes were approximately, equal with-4.742 and-4.741,respectively.The heritability of major genes was 47.13%and the heritability of polygenes was 41.33%.
keywords: mixed major gene plus poly-gene inheritance model

SRaung9Q.title: Effect of Nitrogen Amount on Yield and Physiological Characteristics of Japonica Rice Varieties
SRaung9Q.abstract: Through the investigation of physiological characteristics and panicle traits, an experiment was carried out to study the effect of nitrogen amount in four levels on physiological characteristics and the yield of three japonica rice varieties,‘Shennong 315’,‘Shendao 7’and‘Shendao 11’. The results showed that, with the increasing of nitrogen amount, the leaf area index increased. The panicle length, the primary and secondary rachis-branches at high nitrogen level were more than those of other nitrogen levels. The yield of‘Shennong 315’and‘Shendao 7’were higher, and reached 9.78 t/hm2 and 9.65 t/hm2, respectively, followed by‘Shendao 11’in the high level,‘Shennong 315’,‘Shendao 11’and‘Shendao 7’in middle level, the yield was 9.21, 9.11, 8.60, 8.49 t/hm2, respectively.

sCNEYkNb.title: Comparison of Yield and Quality of Soybean Varieties Following Spring Wheat at Shenyang
sCNEYkNb.abstract: In order to evaluate and select suitable soybean varieties following spring wheat in Shenyang,the yields and quality traits of 15 soybean varieties introduced from Heilongjiang Province were studied.The results showed that the yields were correlated positively with growth period very significantly and had linear regression with growth period(Y = 97.033x-5494.3,R2 = 0.7827**).The average yields of early-maturing,mid-maturing and late maturing varieties were 1880.30,2673.74 and 2955.01 kg·ha-1,respectively.Yields were correlated significantly or very significantly positively with number of nodes on main stem,pods per plant,seeds per plant,plant height,weight of grains per plant and 100-grain weight.The 100-grain weight had significantly positive correlation to protein content but negative correlation to fat content.Late-maturing soybean varieties Heinong 44,Yichun 128,Yichun 05-94,Suinong 10 and mid-maturing variety Suinong 27 got higher yields.Heinong 48,Yichun 05-94,Suinong 27 and Kenjiandou 4 had higher protein content,while Kenjiandou 28,Yichun 2,Kennong 22 and Yichun 128 had higher fat content.Late-maturing and mid-maturing soybean varieties,having high yields and better quality,are suitable for planting following spring wheat in doubled cropping system in Shenyang.

dEdFjg1Z.title: Effects of Different Position Leaves on Grain Plumpness in Rice
dEdFjg1Z.abstract: In this experiment,eight rice cultivars were applied for leaf-cutting treatment at the anthesis.The results indicated that leaf-cutting could lower the percentage of ripened grains and grain weight,especially influence greatly the grains with late flowering,and reduce the yield.The order of the effect that leaves contributed to curved panicle rice's grain filling is as follows:the flag>the second leave from the top>other leaves,while to semi-erect panicle rice flag is the largest.Cutting leaves could significantly increase not-ripened grains percentage.There were little differences among effect of leaves to yield with different panicle type rice.The effect to yield of flag with curved panicle was much more than that of semi-erect panicle.

CNUZrBHa.title: Influence of nitrogen fertilizer on grain yields and physiological characteristics of dry-land spring wheat
CNUZrBHa.abstract: The influence of N fertilizer application ratio at different growth stages on grain yields of Liaochun No.10,a variety of spring wheat grown widely in Liaoning Province,was studied under dry-land conditions.The results showed that N application at seeding stage had important effect on grain yield increase and the yield potential was restricted under no fertilizer,too little fertilizer or too much fertilizer.On the basis of proper N fertilizer application at seeding stage,additional applications of N fertilizer at jointing and anthesis stages were able to maintain high LAI and chlorophyll content in leaves at late growing stage,thus enhancing photosynthetic capacity,and promoting dry matter accumulation and transferring of photosynthetic products to kernels.

LHp2Z8C4.title: The Evaluation of Salt Tolerance Ability of Rice Varieties in Liaoning Province
LHp2Z8C4.abstract: The aim of the study was to identify and screen 51 rice varieties introduced from Shenyang Agriculture University and Institute of Rice,Shenyang Agricultural Academy of Sciences using 0%,0.5%,1.0%,and 1.5% NaCl,in order to obtain extremely salt-resistance rice varieties.Meanwhile,the effect of salt concentration on sprout rates and germination time of these varieties were studied.The results showed that the germination rate was decreased and the time of germination was delayed along with rising of salt concentration,and there is outstanding differentiation between varieties.According to germination rate,Shendao 4,Sifeng 43,Liaoxuan 180,Zhenyou 1 and Zhenyou 2 have strong salt tolerance ability,even can resist 1.5% salt concentration.According to cluster analysis of germination index,Liaoyan 166,Aoyu 316,Zhenyou 2,Zhenyou 1,Liaoyan 188,Shennong 9209 and Sifeng 43 have strong salt tolerance ability.

fBqBjXVr.title: Effects of the Agronomic Traits and Physiological Characteristics on Grain Quality of Rice Varieties with Different Plant-Panicle Type
fBqBjXVr.abstract: In order to identify grain quality of rice plants with different panicle type,42 rice varieties were tested.Taking with panicle erectness,grain density,single panicle weight and plant height,the cultivars were classified into erect,semi-erect and curve panicle types;dense,semi-dense and loose panicle types;heavy,middle and light panicle types;height,middle,semi-dwarf and dwarf haulms,respectively.The effects of agronomic traits and physiological characteristics on quality were analysed.The results showed that curve,semi-dense and light panicle types,and height haulm had little chalky grains and small chalkiness were good appearance quality.Semi-erect,loose and middle panicle types,and middle haulm had high brown rice rate,milled rice rate and head rice rate,so they had good processing quality.Curve,loose and heavy panicle types,and middle haulm had big gel consistency,small amylose content,with cooking and eating quality.Erect,loose and light panicle types,and short haulm had high protein content with good nutritional quality.Suitable reducing neck-panicle node width,panicle length,secondary rachis branches and grain density was beneficial to quality.When photosynthesis rate was on 13.6 μmol/(m2·s) at the maturity stage,it should have good cooking quality.The chlorophyll content was negatively associated with processing,or cooking,quality,but was beneficial to nutritional quality.Maintaining larger LAI at the maturity stage was beneficial to processing quality,but was unfavorable for nutritional quality.

aBOQx4z7.title: On Different Trails and Its Influence of Educational Thought Evolution between Western and China
aBOQx4z7.abstract: The educational thought of Socrates and Confucius is the source in Western and China.They believed in the thought that teachers should teach students in accordance with their aptitude.But they were different in the premise of their thought.Socrates believed in the single premise that students get ideas in accordance with mind recollection.Confucius believed in the diverse premises that teachers should instruct differently according to their different aptitudes.Then,Socrates opened the evolution trail of "educational theory" while Confucius opened "educational thought".The difference of trail causes the different tradition of educational thought and different experience facing educational practice.

tuLDTydK.title: Layout Adjustment:the Effective Path to Improve the Overall Quality of Basic Education
tuLDTydK.abstract: With the progressive universe of nine-year compulsory education,the development of China's basic education has made tremendous achievements.The rapid development of society and the rural basic education has also put up new demands,namely improving the overall quality of basic education in rural areas.Adjusting the layout is an important measure for improving the quality of basic education in rural areas,promoting the balanced development of education and realizing the educational equity.In the process of adjusting the layout,the construction of the "boarding school of 1—9 grade system" in Huan Ren county is the successful practice,as an excellent model of improving the quality of rural education comprehensively.

Jn0uxk7Z.title: On the Difference between School Discipline and Discipline Education from Education Perspective
Jn0uxk7Z.abstract: Discipline is necessary for human development.It is the n ecessary way and important task of school education.The students are educated to respect discipline in cogitation,emotion and behavior.But there are mix phenomenon between discipline and education.School disciplines students through indoctrination,temptation and punishment.We must make difference between education and discipline.We should instruct students to build the rules,accumulate their positive emotion experience and change the humanity hypothesis in order to help students growing up through discipline education

yzyEQkdJ.title: On Esteem and Esteem Education
yzyEQkdJ.abstract: Esteem is needed in the life of individual and human being.Esteem education is of great significance to contemporary theoretical and practical issues.This thesis analyzes the questions on the theoetical meaning and the premise about Esteem education.The authors think the theory of Esteem Education has the characteristic of both object and process,emotion and ration,cogitation and action.The authors discuss positive property,the logic resource and the base of value in order to explore the ontological meaning of esteem education.

frsW7XDA.title: Reviewing Educational Goals in Picture Society
frsW7XDA.abstract: Picture is becoming the important mark in our society.It means the rise in status about perceptual thinking.However,picture becomes the important means of political propaganda and promotes us to think human psychological.Children are growing in such picture surroundings.The children are the major consumers of the picture products.Picture affects their cognitive ways,and has also changed relation between people and the time and space.Therefore,we should deal with the challenges based on profound changes from insights on picture society.The author thinks we should review the educational goals and note to cultivate children's perceptual capacity,the overall analysis capabilities and visual thinking ability in order to deal with the challenges from survivals,politics and thinking in picture society.

lrTyZ1jL.title: Dilemma and Breakthrough:A Modernistic Analysis of the Spirit of School Education in China
lrTyZ1jL.abstract: Since China's entry into modern society,especially since reform and opening door,school education in China is disposed more and more by modernity.With the loss of spiritual back-bone and pillar of their own,schools are on the edge of exhaust to laboriously cope with expectations and demands from all respects.Honestly speaking,the present spiritual dilemma of Chinese schools has resulted from the powerful constraint of state reasoning,over-strengthening of individual survival logic,and an ascending psychology with individual soul lost.To improve the situation,Chinese school education ought to regain its spiritual object,develop the conception of limited school function and adjust the relationship between children and adults to develop a sense of native development.

uY7rFR4k.title: Historical Criticism and Inherent Transcendence:On Theoretical Paradigm of Chinese Pedagogy
uY7rFR4k.abstract: Theoretical Paradigm of Chinese pedagogy belonged to natural realism in1980s.It belonged to humanistic axiology in 1990s and backwards.The two theoretical paradigms held the perspective of external bystanders and tried to provide the perpetual view about educational world.But the problem we really solve is how we handle the relations between man and educational world and how we take action.Therefore Chinese pedagogy must overcome the difficulties from the perspective of external bystanders,form theoretical paradigm of ourselves and provide the view that we handle relations between Chinese and Chinese education.

hwUf4fEI.title: Basic Education in the Late Thirty Years:Knowledge Transformation and Change of Position
hwUf4fEI.abstract: From reform and opening up in recent 30 years,it makes great and historic achievements about China's basic education reform.On the reform process,there are positions of knowledge as "based on the local community-reality criticism" and "facing the world-response to the challenges".At the same time,there exists the position of knowledge as "complexity of characterization-modernity and beyond".The Position changes reflect the development track about the existing problems and achievements in Chinese basic education and the practice about Deng Xiaoping's educational inscription that "Education should be toward modernization,the world and the future."

wtCGtEah.title: On the Hypothesis of Human Nature in the Growth Film and Its Inspiration for School Reform
wtCGtEah.abstract: There are two kinds of strength of supporting and impeding to change in the growth film such as Dead Poets Society and Mona Lisa Smile from the education perspective.The two kinds of strength are different from generations and educational mechanisms.The judgments of the results of education reform were also very different.Comparing these two conflicting strength we can know the assumption of human nature owned by reform strength is more conducive to current school reform.The conflict between the two kinds of strength shows that human freedom is to win the freedom,and true education is to awaken and lead the people's self-awareness.The didactic education activities are impossible to determine the human nature according to the result of success or failure.

SsfpKQWu.title: Wind tunnel test and shape coefficient of wind load research for roof of the main stadium in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center
SsfpKQWu.abstract: The roof of the main stadium in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center is composed of east and west roof like ox horns,and prestressed oblique in-plane truss lattice with maximum cantilever of 49m is adopted.The mean pressure coefficient,mean shape coefficient of the wind load and the wind pressure distribution on the roofs were obtained by the wind tunnel test of the rigid model and compared with the results of the local code.The effects of wind direction on the mean pressure coefficient and mean shape coefficient were researched in detail.The results indicate that the wind load of west roof is larger than that of east roof at most wind directions.The mean wind pressure on the windward profile is positive,while that on the outside and inside surfaces of roof is negative basically.The local maximum negative wind pressure distributes on the front edge of windward roof and the back edge of leeward roof generally.It is suggested that the roof cladding system with the inside and outside surfaces bearing wind load meanwhile should be designed according to the shape coefficients of the inside and outside surfaces respectively.

oHLpNOua.title: Design and research on structural system of spatial beam string structure
oHLpNOua.abstract: For the spatial beam string structure of Beijing Finance Center F7/9,the impact of the ratio of rise to span and the pre-stressing ratio on the structural static behavior and the structural overall stability is analyzed.The results show that the ratio of rise to span has an apparent impact of the structural overall stability and the structural displacement,while the prestressing ratio plays few impact.As the ratio of rise to span increases,the sensibility of the prestressing ratio on the overall stability drops.The existence of the purlin and its connection rigidity take an explicit effect on the overall stability,and the arrangement of the purlin and the diagonal cable largely raises the overall stability,by analyzing and comparing four different calculation models.The structural seismic response performance under rare earthquake is obtained by the elastic-plastic time-history analysis.

dbnLgnDZ.title: Oscillation reduction control analysis and application research of tuning mass damping(TMD) equipment of the signal tower of Henan Provincial Art Centre
dbnLgnDZ.abstract: For Henan Provincial Art Centre,the signal tower,60m high and 3m maximum diameter wide,belongs to a high-slender structure,which creates vibration effect under wind vibration and therefore impacts on the structural safety reliability.Based on the model and time-history analysis of the tower together with its self-vibration character,the passive tuning mass damping(TMD) control equipment is employed.As a result,optimum location,stiffness,mass and damping for the TMD control equipment is achieved,as well as the optimum design of TMD control equipment and its whole structural vibration reduction control are finished.Finally,the TMD control equipment in this project achieves the design goal of wind resistance and vibration reduction control,on the basis of the indication of laboratory test as well as in-situ debugging and test result.

uuXlFi8g.title: Earthquake resistance behavior analysis and research of the coincident structural steel top roof and bottom structures of the theatre of Henan Provincial Art Centre
uuXlFi8g.abstract: The theatre of Henan Provinical Art Centre is a complex structural system,including the long-span structural steel roof with the dimension of 81m×108m and the reinforced concrete bottom structures consisting of main stage,back stage,and exhibition hall.Both spectral response analysis of frequently occured earthquake action and elastic-plastic time-history analysis of seldomly occurred earthquake action are performed,considering the top structure only,the coincident top and bottom structure,and the structures by modifying sliding support connections between top and bottom structures.As a result,there are more than 10 percent impacting on natural frequency of the roof,total seismic horizontal shear force,horizontal displacement, and support reaction,as well as especially apparent impact on the distribution rule of structural plastic hinge under seldomly occurred earthquake action,due to the stiffness of bottom structure and its support restraint.And the coincident effect of top and bottom structures shall be considered in the design of structural steel roof's earthquake-resistance behavior.

03tu3VJf.title: Prestress loss analysis of cable-strut joint of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games
03tu3VJf.abstract: Loop cables are tensioned to prestress in the construction of badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games. The design and construction of the cable-strut joint is key technique to assure the smooth sliding of circumferential cable and the efficient transfer of prestress in circumferential cable. This paper analyses geometrical construction of cable-strut joint, presents method for calculating the prestress loss of the loop cable. The nonlinear contact friction finite element analysis of the loop cable and cable-strut joint is carried on with ANSYS, the prestress loss is calculated through the actual construction monitoring data. The computed results are comparied with the actual monitoring data, and the causes for larger monitoring pretress loss are studied. Following suggestions are provided for cable-strut joint of suspend-dome that loop cables are tensioned to prestress in the construction; the cable-strut joint cast steel should be made precisely to satify the design criterion; the constructional detail of the cable-strut joint should be improved to diminish the prestress loss; the prestress loss value of cable-strut joint is preferable at 5%-6%, meanwhile the cable-strut joint should be made precisely and the construction should be controlled strictly.

JmfdpAmC.title: Design and research of cable and tensioned bar ductile ability for steel structure system of the suspend-dome
JmfdpAmC.abstract: The cable and the tension bar which belong to the basic frame member of the prestressed long-span steel structure system are high strength steel members which had been subject to cold-work hardening and hot rolling and modified treatment separately. After modifying, the members' strength increased significantly and their ductile nature reduced greatly. Large deformation collapse buckling limiting state of the prestressed long-span steel structure system is the controlling factor of the structure security. So it is very important to analyze the ductile nature of the cable and tension bar for the design of the prestressed long-span steel structure system. This paper takes the suspend-dome of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games for example, attempting to analyze and study the stress and the distort ability of the cable and the tension bar under severe earthquake and overall buckling. The study indicates the mechanical behavior of suspend-dome structure, i.e. large deform in system, small strain in cable and bar. It proves that the cable and bar with low ductility capability is safe to be applied on suspend-dome structure system.

a5m7C91V.title: Simulating analysis of prestressing construction process of the suspend-dome of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games
a5m7C91V.abstract: For the large-span suspend-dome structure, prestressing construction process is the one where the geometric system changes from mechanism or quasi-mechanism into structure system which is capable of undertaking design load.. The safety control of this structure system is different from conventional ones. It requires control of the design state namely the ultimate service-state. Simultaneously the structure mechanical property of the prestress tensioning process should be studied, and the safety in the geometric forming process of structure should be controlled. In this paper, the suspend-dome of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games is taken as the research subject by simulating the whole process of prestressing construction with two different calculation methods, analyzing the changing characteristic of shape, internal force and node displacement, and affirming the safety during the construction process. The study indicates that the structural mechanics response by stepped entirely loading method is more than that of element birth-death method. It proves the practicality of stepped entirely loading method usually used in simulating analysis of engineering construction process and the safety of stepped entirely loading method in suspend-dome design. This paper may serve as a good reference for future practice.

bGlLgCSO.title: Design research of Shanxi Provincial Science and Technology Museum
bGlLgCSO.abstract: The steel structural model of Shanxi Provincial Science Museum is analyzed with MIDAS software,and compared with the analysis result of the combined steel-concrete structure model of the museum,subject to the static load and the seismic load respectively.In order to obtain the differences of the structural response from these two models.The results show that the steel structure seismic response in combined structure model increases faster than that of the steel structural model.The seismic response of the ground acceleration and the plastic hinge during the ultimate earthquake are recorded by conducting the elastic-plastic time-history ultimate seismic analysis,showing that the structure owns the apparent strength and the displacement capacity saving,and reaches the objective of rehabilitation after ultimate seismic.The structural steel overall stability is analyzed by using the nonlinear buckling analysis in ANSYS package software for the different models,illustrating that the continuous purlin clearly contributes a lot to the lateral stability of the in-plane truss.

g6WnKSXn.title: Ductility performance design and research of the theatre steel roof of Henan Provincial Art Centre
g6WnKSXn.abstract: The theatre steel roof of Henan Provincial Art Centre is a complex structural system,comprised of the in-plane penetrated weld pipe truss and three reinforced concrete elements underneath.Firstly,structural earthquake-resistant design and research are performed based on ductility by operating analysis of minor shock,midium seismic spectrum and ultimate seismic time-history respectively,as well as quantifying structural natural frequency,member stress ratio,displacement,plastic hinge distribution,and damage level.In addition,structural overall stability design and research are mainly conducted in this design to build the performance design goals of stress-strength ratio,global deformation ductility,and non-buckling key connections respectively under ultimate limit state of large global displacement instability damage,through operating global procedure load-displacement buckling analysis and design,as well as considering geometric nonlinearity,elastic-plastic material,and initial yemetric imperfection.Based on series of analysis and research,the objective of dual ductility performance of both earthquake resistance and global stability safety is realized.

B0SP1e2O.title: Design and research of the large-span steel structure of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games
B0SP1e2O.abstract: Suspend-dome structure system is adopted in the roof steel structure of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games.The system is made up of top chord single-layer latticed shells,bottom cable,and vertical stay-strut.During the design,the whole finite element model,including the roof steel structure and the stand structure below,is established and subject to calculation and analysis.Considering the project importance,structure stress feature,construction inaccuracy,prestressing loss,architectural modeling and construction cost,etc.we assemble various load cases such as dead load,live load,snow load,wind load,temperature and earthquake,and etc.to calculate and analyze the inner force,deformation and overall stability during the structure construction phrase and the structure using phrase,optimize the structural members insuring the security of the whole structure meanwhile.During the design,the sequential element activating method is used to simulate the procedure of construction,and construction simulation analysis is conducted with the consideration of the stiffness effect of the temporary stay.The three-dimensional entity finite element analysis method and contact analysis technology is applied to calculate the prestressing loss for the cable-strut joint.In this paper,non-linear spring system is used to simulate the prestressing loss of the steel cable,and the influence of prestressing loss on the whole structure is studied.

uMFzaIyC.title: Performance analysis and design research of the structural overall stability of the art wall and shared hall of Henan Provincial Art Centre
uMFzaIyC.abstract: For Henan Provincial Art Centre,the deep cantilevered glass art wall,40m high,employs a structural system of the single layer cable-net sub-structure combined with the major structure of in-plane intersecting weld pipe truss.Global stability of the major steel structure is considered to be a key controlling factor on structural safety.Nonlinear structural global buckling analysis is employed to design the structural overall stability performance.In addition,some strengthening methods are conducted to ensure that the whole structure is safe,based on the global stability performance by considering the factors,such as further analysis of the structural geometric arrangement,constraint condition of the key connections,structural initial geometric imperfection,elastic-plastic material of the structural components,load distribution,and computational load sub-steps.

h5lWcHfa.title: Design and research of structural system of tower-cable-pipe truss
h5lWcHfa.abstract: The canopy structure of the stand for Changchun stadium employs a structural system of the cable-stayed pipe truss hanged over the top of two towers. The layout effect of the cable and the prestressing ratio are studied,which indicates that the reasonable layout of the cable can apparently increase the structural overall stability.The overall stability analysis for three different towers is conducted,the result of which shows that the tower with the cable system can raise the tower stability.It indicates that the prestressing can effectively increase the structural bearing capacity and the overall stability.And the finite element analysis for the connection is performed to show the connection with well ductility performance.By operating the elastic-plastic time-history analysis,the cable is still at the elastic stage and the whole structure is not involved in the plastic stage.It indicates that the structure owns a good earthquake-resistance performance.

YBZUoRv3.title: Design and research of coincident work between the cable-net substructure of curtain wall and the major steel structure of Henan Provincial Art Centre
YBZUoRv3.abstract: For Henan Provincial Art Centre,the deep cantilevered glass art wall,40m high,employs a structural system of the single layer cable-net substructure combined with the major steel structure of in-plane penetrated weld pipe truss.Currently,in academic and engineering fields,there are few research results about coincident work between the substructure of curtain wall and the major steel structure,as well as the major-minor structural exchange connection constraint condition of "cable-member contact" impacting on the major steel structure with the substructure.Analysis and research of those mentioned questions present that coincident work provides an advantage for overall stability safety of the major structure,and causes a major disadvantage impact on structural safety of the substructure.According to above research results,the curtain wall consulting company will be advised that the substructure shall be strengthened so as to ensure this project globally safe.

ELOoXuYn.title: Study on comfort analysis of sport field structure with large-span and cantilevered steel floor
ELOoXuYn.abstract: Based on the floor structure of the National Fitness Center in Ejin Horo Banner,Inner Mongolia,the vibration simulation and comfort level of large-span and cantilevered steel floor used as sport field were studied.First,harmonic superposition method based on the measured spectrum was used to simulate human movement loads and the stochastic vibration method was used to simulate the fluctuating wind load on the cantilevered structure.And then,the key parameters about structural comfort of the large-span floor were analyzed.Next,all possible load cases were considered and the comfort level of the athletes and spectators were analyzed.The result shows: changing the floor prestressing cannot improve the large-span structure comfort level effectively;the vertical acceleration and natural frequency decrease approximately in proportion with the increase of the floor thickness.According to the method of this paper,different comfort control indices should be adopted for sports field and spectators stand,respectively.Design references of load simulation,comfort performance index and control standards are provided in this paper for large-span prestressed and cantilevered steel floor structure project that used for stadium.

NWZsPps7.title: Simulation analysis of construction process of multistory large cantilevered steel structure
NWZsPps7.abstract: The mian structure of the National Fitness Center in Ejin Horo Banner,Inner Mongolia is a multistory large cantilevered structure.The stress is highly concentrated at the end of the cantilevered truss which is the key part of the structure.The upper floor of the cantilevered truss is subjected to tension and the lower floor of cantilevered truss subjected to compression.The concrete pouring sequence of the floor has a great impact on the internal force of whole structure and itself.This paper used Midas/Gen to set up finite element model and achieve mechanical simulation by ' activation ' and ' passivation ' element.Then simulation of construction procedure,sequences of floor stiffness forming and installation order of key frame members were taken,and the inner force and deformation at the construction procedure were analyzed.On this basis,the best construction scheme was obtained.The scheme can optimize the internal force of key element and solve stress concentrate problems at the end of cantilevered truss by installation elements at the end of cantilevered truss after several steps of uninstall temporary supports.It can also reduce the tension at the upper floor of cantilevered truss by pouring the upper floor of cantilever truss after uninstall temporary supports completely.

yCJrDtZj.title: Design and research on cable dome structural system of the National Fitness Center in Ejin Horo Banner,Inner Mongolia
yCJrDtZj.abstract: The structural system of cable dome with span of 71.2 m is employed for the roof structure of the National Fitness Center in Ejin Horo Banner,Inner Mongolia.It's the first large-span cable dome structure in mainland of our country.Firstly,the whole finite element model of cable dome structure was established and subjected to static analysis under various design and normal load combinations.That the unevenly distributed load was detrimental for cable dome structure was put forward by analyzing the force-bearing characteristics of cable dome structure at elastic stage.Secondly,the conclusions were drawn that the torsional stiffness of cable dome was weak and the membrane can improve the torsional stiffness effectively by analyzing dynamic characteristics.Subsequently,the whole process of elasto-plastic bucking analysis for cable dome system was performed to obtain the three stages in the whole loading process:relaxation of ridge cable,yielding of loop cable and breaking of structure.Meanwhile the influence of geometrical parameters on structural elasto-plastic performance was analyzed.Finally,the design method of cable dome structure based on performance was proposed,the strength and deformation performance and bearing capacity control indexes at each stage were put forward.

uNxQROTe.title: Main Stractural Design of Hangzhou International Conference Center
uNxQROTe.abstract: Hangzhon International Conference Certer is a sphere shell building with 85m diameter.It is a five star hotel with 16 layers in the sphere building.The structural plane and section plane are c-shaped and the stractural systern is irregular.Static design,wind design and control of aseimic torision are difficult.After many projects for material system (concrete or steel) and structural system are analyzed,the final structural system which makes use of the longitude and woof of the sphere is chosen.The static anlysis,wind design,seismic design and geometry monlinear analysis are performed to realize economic and safety.

h4SRl0A9.title: Influence of prestress loss on structural behavior of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games
h4SRl0A9.abstract: Loop cable tensioning method was adopted in the construction of the badminton gymnasium for 2008 Olympic Games.Due to the processing and installation difficulty,the prestress loss of cable-strut joint is much more than the design value causing the unbalance of cable forces.In this paper,by coupling the degrees of freedom of loop cable joint and brace strut lower joint and adjusting stiffness spring element,the frication sliding of loop cable is simulated.This method can be used in finite element model to simulate accurately the value of the prestress loss in loop cable during tensioning process.Furthermore,the influence of the prestress loss on internal forces,deformation and the overall stability is studied.The study shows that the prestress loss results in wide-range change of the inner force of radial tension bars;non-uniform of inner force of steel shell;narrow change of the overall displacement,non-uniform of the displacement of the same loop members;about 20% decline of overall stability.

lyk6OhL7.title: Study on static and seismic performance of multi-floor steel cantilevered structure
lyk6OhL7.abstract: The narrower on lower floors and the wider on upper floors structure is used in the National Fitness Center, in Ejin Horo Banner, Inner Mongolia, which has the characteristic of extreme vertical stiffness irregularity. The elasto-plastic performance in the condition of static stability limit state becomes the key factors of the security of the structure. First, the performance of the main structure in the condition of static loading was analyzed adopting the performance target put forward in this paper. The choice of the multi-floor structure with the huge grid as the best scheme was made among many schemes. Then the seismic performance studies were conducted by response spectrum analysis, elastic dynamic time-history analysis and elasto-plastic dynamic time-history analysis respectively. The key part of the analysis is the irregularity of the structure, the security at the end of cantilever and the elasto-plastic performance in the condition of major earthquake. Analysis shows that the structural scheme selected based on the performance target put forward in this paper is economic and reasonable, and the static and seismic performance objectives for design are realized.

K5R27QdW.title: Full-scale model experiment and research of large diameter steel tubular spatial penetrated joint with chord bearing tension
K5R27QdW.abstract: The damage test of ultimate bearing capacity for the full-scale joint of large diameter penetrated pipes with chord bearing tension was performed for the steel roof of the main stadium in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center.For the sake of further research on test process and damage phenomenon of the joint,both the damage pattern and the damage determination criteria of this type of joint were determined by analyzing the stress distribution of penetrated joint during each loading step and the plastic zone development process during the whole loading process,as well as studying the damage mechanics of spatial penetrated joint using finite element analysis(FEA).The design bearing capacity of this joint with chord bearing tension was studied through experiment,compared to the results from the local code and FEA,using the design bearing capacity criteria.The effect of the chord tension on the bearing capacity of the spatial penetrated joint were studied by FEA,the local code and the design bearing capacity criteria.The results show that the bearing capacity decreases gradually with the tension of chord increasing.

hg5AQX0h.title: Seismic performance design and research on the steel roof of the main stadium in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center
hg5AQX0h.abstract: The structural system of prestressed oblique in-plane truss lattice with maximum 49m cantilever was employed for the main stadium roof in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center.The seismic performance design objective was determined,and then the seismic performance studies were conducted by response spectrum analysis,elastic dynamic time-history analysis and elasto-plastic dynamic time-history analysis respectively.The numerical analysis and design were performed to obtain the structural natural frequency of vibration,member stress ratio,displacement,plastic hinge distribution,and damage level based on different three models,which are only reinforced concrete stand,only steel roof and combined stand and roof.The single point's motivation and multiple points' motivation were utilized to perform dynamic time-history analysis for the combined model respectively.As shown from analyses,the co-ordinate work of the combined model shall be considered for the safety of the structure.The results show the structural safety can be ensured by using single point's motivation method.Besides,under ultimate seismic load,the structural steel roof benefits from the stiffness degradation from reinforced concrete stand.Through above series of research,the seismic performance design objective was realized.

LvsUqeGw.title: Performance test and computation analysis research of the big gap weld pipe truss tubular joint of Henan Provincial Art Centre
LvsUqeGw.abstract: For Henan Provincial Art Centre,both the art wall and the structural steel roof adopt a structural system of the penetrated weld pipe truss.It is not certain that whether or not the current penetrated weld pipe truss connection principle suits for the large diameter pipe used in this project,because there is a relative systematic research on the connection of penetrated weld pipe truss in China,the research results mainly focus on the small diameter pipe.On the other hand,some penetrated weld pipe truss connections do not meet the current standards and codes,because of more complex architectural shape,deformation during transport movement,deformation during weld,and defect during installation.For instance,the maximum gap between connections is 30mm in this project.In order to solve the safety problem of this type of connection with large diameter and big gap,two connections are selected to do full-size connection test,and 30mm long gap is determined between penetrated weld profiles,which are welded by the proposed weld technology.In addition,the three dimension finite element models of those connections are built to obtain the result of safety performance of those connections,compared to that of full-size test,to ensure the safety performance of those connections with large diameter and big gap in this project,simultaneously to verify the applicability to this type of connections' design based on both formula in codes and finite element analysis methodology.The bearing capacity of penetrated weld pipe truss connections is discussed.

Okjqo0SM.title: RESEARCH ON DYNAMIC CHARACTERISTICS AND SEISMIC RESPONSE OF THE NEW SUSPEND-DOME STRUCTURE OF BADMINTON GYMNASIUM FOR 2008 OLYMPIC GAMES
Okjqo0SM.abstract: The steel roof suspend-dome structure of the badminton gymnasium is the maximal suspend-dome structure in China by now, the maximal diameter of it is 93 meter. A finite element model of the structure is set up and the analysis and research on the dynamic characteristics of the structure are done; the forward 60 natural frequency of vibration is extracted, and then it is concluded that the model has closely distributed modes, more vertical modes and many symmetrical modes. A proper seismic wave is chosen to make seismic time history analysis on horizontal direction and vertical direction, the moving inner force of the whole structure is obtained and the results are compared with those of the response spectrum method. It is also concluded that the radial braces and members have maximal response in seismic action and horizontal seism has a control action ,etc. Which may be a reference for project seismic design.
keywords: suspend-dome modal analysis seismic wave time history analysis response spectrum analysis

Krmhxk3Y.title: Concrete structural design of Guiyang Olympic Center main stadium engineering
Krmhxk3Y.abstract: The concrete structure of the Guiyang Olympic Center main stadium,of which the west stand for the steel structure,is the concrete inclined frame with 6 meters outwardly cantilever,adopts Y form column.In the whole calculation,the path toward the frame adopts a slice frame to carry on internal force calculation analysis and summarize internal force distributing orderliness of inclined frame.According to internal force analysis result,composite beam and column are adopted in the structure partly.Design is carried on a composite member of tension bent and two way off centre compressed.Also carry on finite element analysis to the key node of Y form column.The super long concrete stand structure,according to calculating result,adopts some structure measures to solve the concrete temperature stress problem.Because of the higher pull and level force,the steel cantilever shed foundation fall to the ground adopts pile foundation.

7sCtbpk4.title: Distribution rule analysis and research of wind dynamic shape factor of the art wall of Henan Provincial Art Centre
7sCtbpk4.abstract: Henan Provincial Art Centre has a unique architectural shape with the group buildings,which creates an apparent mutual interference from each specific building due to wind group effect.The art wall,situated in the middle of group buildings,owns a unique shape of "horn mouth" that generates wind gathering effect.According to wind tunnel test,the dynamic shape factors on the typical locations of the art wall are mainly listed and compared,in addition that it is summarized that barrier,canyon effect,and spiral vortex action have an impact on dynamic shape factor in group effect,which provides the references to other similar projects.

RFwmUa4Q.title: The overall stability analysis of the suspend-dome structure system of the badm inton gymnasium for 2008 O lympic Games
RFwmUa4Q.abstract: Suspend-dome structure,which is a kind of sem i-flexible structure,is applied in the roof steel structure of the badm inton gymnasium for 2008 O lympic Games.The overall stability of the structure is a dom inating factor during the design.Suspend-dome structure is featured by close buckling eigenvalues and local bucklingmodes.This paper attempts to analyze the effect of calculation method,material elastic-plasticity,connection detail and prestressing loss on the overall stability of suspend-dome.The study ind icates that load substep,material elastic-plasticity and the cable-strut joint have significant effect on the overall stability of the suspend-dome of the badm inton gymnasium for 2008 O lympic Games.Finally,a long-span steel structures performance design based on structural overall stability is presented and the overall stability coefficient is suggested.

jEYK3CP4.title: Computation analysis and test research of the cable-net substructure-major steel structure exchange joint of the theatre of Henan Provincial Art Centre
jEYK3CP4.abstract: The art wall of Henan Provincial Art Centre is a structural system of the single layer cable-net substructure-the major steel structure of in-plane intersection weld pipe truss.The exchange joint is one of the critical joints,which realizes the mechanics effect of the coincident work and ensures the global safe structure.The exchange joint between the major and minor steel structure with complex mechanics is totally different from the normal joint.The ANSYS finite element analysis software is employed to perform elastic-plastic contact analysis for the exchange joint.Furthermore,full-size joint test is conducted to confirm joint of the mechanics calculation of this type of complex joint,and to insure safety of the key joint.

8lIG0ZsM.title: Full-scale model experiment and research of large diameter steel tubular spatial penetrated joint subject to moment
8lIG0ZsM.abstract: The damage test of ultimate bearing capacity for the full-scale joint of large diameter penetrated pipes subject to moment was performed for the steel roof of the main stadium in Guiyang Olympic Sports Center.For the sake of further research on test process and damage phenomenon of the joint,both the damage pattern and the damage determination criteria of this type of joint were determined by analyzing the stress distribution of penetrated joint during each loading step and the plastic zone development process during the whole loading process,as well as the damage mechanics of spatial penetrated joint was studied by finite element analysis(FEA).The design bearing capacity of this joint subject to moment was studied through experiment,compared to the results from the local code and FEA,in order to provide some design advice and references for the revision of local code and design.The impacts of moment due to eccentricity of the web bar on the bearing capacity of the spatial penetrated joint were studied by FEA to provide some suggestions for the safety determination of this joint because of construction deviation in real projects.

uaQa0lgY.title: Design research of rigid connected truss string in Shaoxing Sports Exhibition Hall
uaQa0lgY.abstract: Rigid connected truss string is adopted in the roof of Shaoxing Sports Exhibition Hall.Compared with hinged connected truss string,some distinguishing features of bearing capacity have been found.Therefore,the arrangement of pre-stressed cables is different.Several schemes had been researched,which have different position of pre-stressed cable's stretching end.The results indicate that the position greatly influences on internal force and overall stability of these truss strings.Also,it has little influence on vertical displacement,and it does not change the dynamic performance of the structure.The best position of pre-stressed cable's stretching end is proposed by analyzing of these results.The static behavior,dynamic performance and overall stability capacity of three transverse brace system with typical arrangement modes were studied.The results show that the comprehensive properties of the whole roof structure are the best while indirect continuous transverse truss has been arranged.

qIWCCHAM.title: Ductility security performance of the cable-net pipe truss in Henan Provincial Art Centre
qIWCCHAM.abstract: The cantilevered art wall with 40m height at Henan Provincial Art Centre,employs a structural system of the single layer cable-net combined with pipe truss.The structural overall stability analysis was conducted considering geometric nonlinearity,elastic-plastic material,and initial geometric imperfection respectively,to identify the yield ratio and the structural ductile deformation under the buckling collapse limit state.The structural seismic performance was studied on the basis of the ductility behavior by performing the elastic-plastic time-history analysis.The numerical analysis and design were conducted for the structure modal,the member stress ratio,the structure displacement,the plastic hinge distribution,and the collapse level.Through the above analysis,the objective of the double ductility performance design of the earthquake-resistance security and the overall stability security was realized.

stcIEOQH.title: Design and research on a prestressed steel truss structure with broken line form cable in exhibition center of National Innovation of Zhongguancun
stcIEOQH.abstract: A large-span space truss structure with broken line form prestressed cable is used in exhibition center of National Innovation of Zhongguancun.The prestressed system is seldom used in similar steel structure engineering,therefore the selection of prestressed structure system and simulation analysis of construction method have vital significance on the safety and reliability of the project.Different calculation models were adopted and several main parameters,such as layout forms of cables,prestressed degree,height-span ratio of truss were selected to research the distribution of structure system and summarize the reasonable selection of the key parameters of prestressed system.Under the same control index of bearing capacity,the performance of the static and static elastic-plastic of prestressed system and non-prestressed system were analyzed to confirme the effectiveness of prestressed system.The method of killing or activating element was applied to simulate and calculate the whole process of prestressed construction of structure.The influence on the final mechanical properties of the different support installation ways was analyzed and the reasonable construction plan was determined.The analysis of prestress loss of broken line form transfer joint and the friction resistance test were also done.By comparing the key parameters,such as displacement,cable force and so on between construction monitoring data and theoretical calculations,the security of the structural design was verified.

5hy6rNwn.title: Analysis of tension form-finding and whole loading process simulation of cable dome structure
5hy6rNwn.abstract: For cable dome structure, prestressing construction process is the change of the geometrical system from mechanism to structure which can bear design load. The following aspects are considered including the prestressed cable system setting and achieving of the formed shape of structure by prestress tension, the formed shape of structure satisfying normal use and safety requirements, determining the reasonable form by optimization of prestressing degree. Prestress tension form-finding and simulation of whole loading process were analyzed through restart analysis for cable dome structure. Firstly, as prestress tension methods has no influence on the final formed shape of structure by analyzing prestress tension simulation for cable dome structure, a flexible technical space will be created for construction unit formulating plans of prestress tension. Secondly, the whole process simulation under different prestressing degrees was performed to obtain performance control indexes at each stage. The prestress rationality and safety of structure were determined based on the conclusions for the project. At last, the initial prestressing degree P 0 that can keep the initial geometric form was determined. The research shows that the initial prestress P 0 of 7.5~10.0 times as the design prestress is the safe and reasonable choice by analyzing the elasto-plastic ductile performance of different span cable dome structures under different prestressing degrees. The research methods and conclusions was used in design of large-span cable dome structure, which is roof structure of the National Fitness Center in Ejin Horo Banner, Inner Mongolia, first built in mainland of our country.

gtL5CBCf.title: Design and research of structural system of intestine prestress large span penetrated weld pipe truss
gtL5CBCf.abstract: Northeast Normal University gymnasium adopts prestress space steel structural system,the roof applys structural system of intestine prestress large span penetrated weld pipe truss,through prestress cable making cable and penetrated weld pipe truss work together,so as to adjust structural mechanics performance,and improve structural statics,dynamical characteristic and the structural overall stability.Through finite element analysis, structural performance is researched based on structural intensity,elasticity deformation and structural overall stability to expatiate the connection of prestress stiffness and structural overall stability.The results can provide reference for other similar project.

OcxplIZA.title: Analysis and research on the stability performance of plane beam string structure
OcxplIZA.abstract: For plane beam string structure,structure system bar's out-plane stability is the key factor for design.Base on the plane beam string structure of Qianan Culture Exhibit Center,considering structural initial geometric imperfection the stability performance of plane beam string structure is analyzed while the joint of stay bar,prestress ratio change.The effect rules of bar restriction condition,prestress ratio is obtained on overall stability of plane beam string structure. The join construction and mechanics performance design method are put forward for the structure.The conclusion can provide reference for other similar structural projects.

aGVGxZkb.title: Research and analysis on large span external prestressed cantilever pipe truss of Guiyang Sports Center
aGVGxZkb.abstract: The cantilevered roof of the stadium with 49m long at Guiyang Sports Centre employs a structural steel system of the diagonal in-plane truss with the external prestressing along the top chord.The prior selection of structural system is conducted based on the performance of deformation.The impacts of the height-span ratio and the prestressing ratio on the structural overall stability performance are investigated,the results show that the effects are notable and nonlinear.The preliminary arch camber has slight impact on the overall stability.To identify the validity of the prestressed structural system,the equivalent balanced load is firstly presented on the prestressed structural system,the validity is interpreted by using the concept of that.The contact analysis is conducted for the transfer connection between the prestressed cable and the steel member to recognize the prestressing loss and the connection security,and to analyze and identify the ductility security of the prestressed cable with poor ductility performance.

Lyu9RQUM.title: Art Wall Steel Structure Design of Henan Art Centre
Lyu9RQUM.abstract: The total area of art centre of Henan Province is 85 000 square meters.The art wall is the most important part of the art centre.The shape is special and unique.The glass curtain wall is used,the wind-resistant and structural total stability of which are the control facters.The results show that the design is rational.

JRLFk8Cb.title: Coincident work analysis of the upper and lower structure of suspended dome
JRLFk8Cb.abstract: For the badminton gymnasium of 2008 Olympic Games,two computer structural models,the only upper suspended dome structure and the whole structure,were built to conduct modal analysis,static analysis and earthquake-resistance analysis and then to compare the results from the two models,focusing on the research of the impact of the lower reinforce concrete structure on the upper structural steel roof.As shown in the results,the lower reinforced concrete structure has a general impact on the upper structural steel suspended dome when it comes to the internal force and the deformation differences from the two models,subject to the temperature load and the seismic load each.As a result,the coincident work between the upper and lower structure should be considered,based on which the structural optimization design can be performed.

rNuj9peh.title: Performance based design and research of large span steel structures
rNuj9peh.abstract: The failure patterns of the large span steel structure(LSSS) at all levels,from the system level to the member and joint levels,can be attributed to the large deformation instability.The safety control indices for LSSS mainly include the load carrying capacity and the deformation ductility.However,the current Chinese steel design code and other relating design specifications lack the provisions that provide a systematic regulation on the safety performance indices for LSSS at the joint and system levels.Based on a large number of engineering design practices and experimental studies,structural analyses were firstly carried out considering the geometrical non-linearity and material non-linearity.Then the load-stress,load-strain and load-displacement whole process curves were obtained.The strength and deformation ductility of LSSS were carefully investigated.On this basis,the control indices of strength and deformation ductility for systems and joints of LSSS under elastic and elasto-plastic analysis were set up and a ductility performance-based method for LSSS design was put forward.

sZH3EgYI.title: Structure design and research of steel large span suspended dome of the gymnasium in Sanya Sports Centre
sZH3EgYI.abstract: The steel structure roof of gymnasium in Sanya Sports Centre is employed for the design and research of the large span prestressed suspended dome structural system.The roof structure is comprised of the single-layer latticed shell on the top,the bottom hoop cable and radial tension bar,and the vertical stay-strut.For the design,the finite element model is established for the structural steel roof.On the basis of the consideration of structural feature of geometric mechanics,prestressing loss,and construction imperfection,the internal force and the deformation are calculated on the ultimate state and the working state respectively subject to the combination load cases from dead load,live load,wind load,temperature and earthquake load,as well as the impact on the structural overall stability is mainly analyzed.

7Vmdj0Jp.title: Full-scale model experiment and research of large diameter steel tubular spatial penetrated joint with compression chord
7Vmdj0Jp.abstract: The full-scale joints were made to conduct collapse test for the top and bottom chords of the tubular space truss of the roof,which is based on the main stadium of Guiyang Olympic Sports Center.The test scheme,process,phenomenon,and results were introduced.The collapse models were generated by performing analysis of the test data and comprehending the stress distribution status of the connections on each load sub-step according to the full-step loading test character.The elasto-plastic finite element analysis(FEA) was performed for the connections to obtain the stress,strain and displacement by considering geometric and material nonlinearity,and demonstrate the strength capacity,plastic development zone,as well as stress and strain distribution status of the connections.In order to make sure the criterion for bearing capacity and damage criterion of tubular space joint,the design strength capacity of the joints was calculated based on national code compared to the results from full-scale test and FEA analysis.The spatial relation of spatial joints was discussed.

EJBjj1j8.title: Effect of Temperature on Stabilizing Process of Aerobic Bioreactor Landfill
EJBjj1j8.abstract: Variations of the features of leachate and components of landfill at different temperatures were simulated experimentally to study the effect of temperature on the stabilizing process of aerobic bioreactor landfill.The results indicated that the concentration of chemical oxygen demand(COD) and ammonia nitrogen of leachate decreased more rapidly at higher temperature between 20-40 ℃.Moreover,the concentration of ammonia nitrogen at 40 ℃ reached the threshold limit value specified by GB16889—2008 standards after 56 d,which is 84 d earlier than that at 20 ℃.Higher temperature between 20-40 ℃ would result in a less leachate yield and a more remarkable decline in moisture content of solid waste and total organic carbon(TOC) in the whole landfill process,and thus brought a thorough degradation of wastes.When the landfill was finished,it subsided and stabilized rapidly.Therefore,higher temperature is beneficial for acceleration of stabilization of landfill.

lxL0Z6Qw.title: Membrane Separation Technique Applied to Improving Extraction Technology of Tylosin
lxL0Z6Qw.abstract: Instead of plat-and-frame filtration,separation processes with ultrafiltration(UF) and nanofiltration(NF) were introduced to purify and concentrate the tylosin broth.After comparing several membranes with different materials and molecular weight cut-off,PES-150 and DL2540 were found to be the optimum UF and NF membranes.With the pretreatment of tylosin fermentation by using diatomite and additive 250L de-ionized water,flux of UF would increase 82%.Meanwhile,yield coefficient of tylosin was almost 97%.Purities of each component of tylosin of UF and plat-and-frame filtrate were almost same.The yield coefficient of tylosin in extraction of UF filtrate increased 20%~26%.NF concentrated the UF filtrate with concentration multiples 3.5 and flux was 41.3 L/(m2·h).The yield coefficient of tylosin of NF was 99%.The color of extract phase of concentrated solution of NF,which without emulsification,was lighter than the ones without UF-NF.

lsjQRjYy.title: Application of Membrane Technique in Apple Juice Processing
lsjQRjYy.abstract: Apple cloudy juice was clarified and sterilized by plate ultrafiltration separation technology.The influence of pasteurization,enzymes and temperature on the flux of the membrane were studied.Three different apple juice were used in the experiment: apple juice with pasteurization and enzyme hydrolysis,apple juice with pasteurization but no enzyme hydrolysis,apple juice without pasteurization and enzyme hydrolysis.The ultrafiltration combination,operating parameters on the filtration quality of the three different materials were studied.The effect of reverse osmosis system was also discussed.The results showed that plate ultrafiltration membrane flux is much more than pipe ultrafiltration membrane and meets the industrial demand.The best operating temperature of ultrafiltration membrane is 50℃.When water is at 0.09 times,the liquid of the concentration factor can reach more than 20 times.Analytical results showed that: the transmittance of the filtration of apple juice was over 97%,color value was above 50%,turbidity was less than 0.3.There is no much difference among pH,acidity,sugar,soluble solid and amino nitrogen content before and after filtration.From the quality of apple juice and heat-resistant bacteria examination results,our conclusion is that the plate ultrafiltration membrane can substitute the pasteurization and enzyme hydrolysis.Ultrafiltration of apple juice was concentrated by reverse osmosis system by 2~2.3 times;sugar retention rate is 100%.

Naea0j8j.title: Flow Behavior in Nanostructured Microchannels with Changing Surface Wettability
Naea0j8j.abstract: Deposition in the capillary wall to silica microspheres with changing surface wettability,in order to build hydrophilic/hydrophobic and nanostructured micro-channels,the preparation of certain viscosity carboxymethy cellulose sodium aqueous solution,its flow behavior in the substrate capillary and the capillary modification were exa-mined.The results show that keeping the pressure constant,the flux of substrate capillary liquid decreases with increasing viscosity,with the tube length increasing.The viscosity is 14cP,as the pressure increasing,the flux of hydrophobic channel is faster than hydrophilic channel,and the rough channel of hydrophobic/hydrophilic flow slope ratio is greater than the smooth.It was also found that liquid in hydrophilic channel flows faster than hydrophobic channel in the low-pressure and high pressure was just the opposite,and the slip theory and Newton′s laws of motion were employed to explain the phenomena.The results provide novel and valuable guidance for rationally manipulating fluid in microchannels.

pxtRGVUF.title: Preparation and Properties of Ferulic Acid Molecularly Imprinted Composite Membrane
pxtRGVUF.abstract: Ferulic acid molecularly imprinted composite membrane(MIM) was prepared via in situ polymerization by UV-irradiation using microfiltration polyvinylidene fluoride(PVDF) membrane as the supported membrane,ferulic acid as template,metnacrylic acid(MAA) as functional monomer and ethylene-glycol dimethyacrylate(EGDMA) as cross-linking agent.MIM was used to extract the ferulic acid.The morphology and structure of the composite membrane were characterized by scanning electron microscopy and infrared spectroscopy.The crystal structure and mechanical properties of the composite membrane were researched by X-ray diffraction and tensile techniques.The binding ability and penetration choosing performance of the composite membrane were researched by static adsorptive method and flat ultrafiltration membrane separator.Results showed that ferulic acid molecularly imprinted composite membrane exhibited excellent combining for the ferulic acid with the combined selective factor 1.9 at the concentration of 0.1 mmol/L.When the membrane permeated for 40 min,penetration trough quantity of imprinted compo-site membrane was 5.16 μmol/cm2 for ferulic acid.Compared with cinnamic acid with the penetration selective factor 1.74,penetrated performance of molecularly imprinted composite membrane was better than the non-imprinted composite membrane.
